## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Problem It Solves
Explain the problem this feature would solve. Why do you need this?

## User Story
**As a** [type of user]
**I want** [goal/desire]
**So that** [benefit/value]

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Examples
- Are there similar features in other tools?
- Do you have mockups or designs?
- Can you provide example use cases?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Implementation Ideas
If you have technical ideas on how to implement this, share them here:
- Which files might need changes?
- Any third-party libraries needed?
- Performance considerations?

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Nice to have
- [ ] Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Critical for my use case
